name: Grand Casino Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Vegas! Lure your guests in with the promise of exciting nights and quick cash and empty their pockets. Build the casino your guests dream of, manipulate their decisions and expand your casino empire on your road to success!

Build your casino from scratch and design your very own masterpiece. Pick from countless unique objects and create the casino your players' dream of. Customize your casino, adjust everything to your liking and architect yourself to the top.

Understand your guests, influence their desires and manipulate their decisions. Pick from different strategies to outsmart your gamblers and make sure they behave the way you want. Will you adjust the casino to your gamblers or your gamblers to your casino? There are different strategies to become the best casino manager in town!

Expand wisely, optimize your floorplan and adjust your casino for upcoming events. Research new technologies and implement exciting new gambling machines and tables to improve your casino even further. Roll the dice and build your legacy!

Do you have what it takes to succeed in the challenging world of casino gambling? Be smarter than the rest, overcome challenges and take the gambling throne!

Challenging campaign with multiple casinos
Sandbox mode
VIPs – special guests with special needs
Extensive tech tree and strategy choices
Countless gambling objects (slot machines, Poker-, Roulette-, Craps etc.)
Even more additional objects (bars, restaurants, toilets, camera’s, manipulation objects)
Advanced gambler need system (happiness, hunger, thirst, booze)
Staff management
Diverse strategies to success
